svg.title: Two TTAI eyeball agents on Meshtastic ESP32 devices scanning humongous fungus bio marks and searching for Ball
svg.desc: Panoramic six-by-two scene with two eyeball agents perched on ESP32 square devices, linked by Meshtastic signals around a giant fungus with bio mark overlays and a glowing red Ball location beacon.

g.text: spore pulse | cap ring shift | mycelium branch map
